name: Neon Shark
description:
Play as a shark with mechatronic modifications fighting for its freedom. Will you hone your natural instincts or upgrade your cybernetic gear?

This game was made for two game jams: MiniJam & GeoJam and tried to adhere to both themes :)

  • Depths - depths of the ocean / the sea.
  • Health is a Tool - Abilities cost health.
  • Geo Art - for Geo Jam.
  • Pick a Side - Natural instinct vs. Cybernetic mods.
